code: import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const navigate=useNavigate();const handleNavClick=sectionId=>{navigate('/');setTimeout(()=>{const section=document.getElementById(sectionId);if(section){section.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}},100);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"bg-white shadow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 py-4 flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-xl font-bold text-black",children:"Directory Maker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"flex space-x-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursor-pointer text-black hover:text-blue-600",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('features'),children:"Features"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursor-pointer text-black hover:text-blue-600",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('pricing'),children:"Pricing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursor-pointer text-black hover:text-blue-600",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('faq'),children:"FAQ"})]})]})});}export default Header;
